creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: skull cap with tail; blue velvet with gold embroidery; motifs circle with loop design around; long ovals between circles; on tail - tree motif with colored stars; woven band around edges of tail; band with metallic threads around base of cap and top edges of tail; two buttons on tail; fully lined with print fabric
dimension: 3 x 4 3/8 x 21 in. (7.62 x 11.11 x 53.34 cm) (including tail)
medium: Cotton, silk, gold thread, mother of pearl
title: Hat
